description: APPLICATION FOR PRIOR APPROVAL IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION WITH A DEPTH OF 3.9M, MAXIMUM HEIGHT OF 3M AND EAVES HEIGHT OF 3M.
decision_conditions:
Reason : 1 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason: 

The proposed development including an outbuilding in the rear garden, falls outside the scope of prior approval which applies to the enlargement, improvement or alteration to a dwellinghouse. The proposal fails to comply with Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2, of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Reason : 2 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason: 
In the absence of accurate dimensions confirming the maximum height of the enlarged part of the dwellinghouse, the proposal would fail to provide sufficient information to demonstrate the proposal to complies with criteria outlined in A.4 in particular A.4(2)(a)(ii) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2, of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Reason : 3 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason: 
The proposed extension would extend to the past a wall forming a side elevation and the width of the extension would exceed more than half the width or the original dwellinghouse, as such the scheme would fail to comply with condition A.1(j) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2, of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
